metadata.title: CVE-2022-43243 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability via ff_hevc_put_weighted_pred_avg_8_sse in sse-motion.cc.This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaa crafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
